item.title: Fair Bare - January Â£10 Sale!
item.description: Fair & Bare – The little shop I run (with a little help from my wife) is having a January Sale right now in celebration of entering the year 2010. Every shirt we’ve made to date is just 10 squid! Hurry up people, it only runs until Sunday.
